titles.title: To amend the Act of March 3, 1931 (known as the Davis-Bacon Act) to require that contract work covered by the Act which requires licensing be performed by a person who is so licensed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/4/1997--Introduced. Amends the Davis-Bacon Act to require that a covered contract in a State which requires licensing be performed by a person who is so licensed.
